title: Build Configuration
description: Build configuration placed as nerest/build.json in the root of the application.

excludes.description: Excludes modules from the client build and replaces them with empty modules instead.

externals.description: Excludes modules from the client build and maps them to globally available constants instead.

postcss.description: Additional PostCSS configuration. Nerest uses the standard vite PostCSS configuration by default.

plugins.description: List packages and options of PostCSS plugins to use. They will be added to the default plugin list.
